Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown with trace of line in added red; exterior: part of hook maeander frieze above wide and narrow brown lines; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the paired hook maeander pattern below the handle zone, see Lemos no. 236 and no. 237 (the Würzburg chalices).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0080) (phase 2)
